resources.string: Is a geo location based augmented reality application submitted as partial fulfilment of the Newcastle University MSc E-Business (Information Systems) degree.
Using sensors embedded in the mobile device and satellites in space, the application calculates GPS co-ordinates to pin point a users location and
overlays geo-location specific information of objects at the users current position and surroundings over a camera view
from external service providers in real-time from their respective data servers such as Urban Observatory who have deployed a range of sensors around the city that record various conditions.
